title: [Evermore Hollow, Inner Ring]
description: Leaning like an aging uncle, a monstrous mansion rises above the cramped streets with slanted windows and crooked pillars that support a sprawling, if ill-repaired porch.  Burgundy, chocolate, and black cherry roses weave through long trellises that decorate the facade, their creeping vines spreading to eclipse a dull green moss-covered stone arch.  Looping over the canal, and opposite a pathway leading southwest, a cobbled bridge provides egress to the town's infamous inn.
